info.description: Open API for integrate system in KST
info.title: Choti API

tags.name: Log Service
tags.description: Service to keep logs from other system

tags.name: Inner Weighting Process Service
tags.description: Service use at live and cooked shrimp

get.description: Get list of bin that registered in system
Return bin by request bin ID

get.summary: Get Config specify by group and name
get.description: Return  config value specify by group and name, config will be json or just single value

parameters.name: isJsonValue
parameters.description: specify that request config value is json type or not

get.description: Return employees' information specify by ID.

parameters.name: rfid
parameters.description: rfid tag number that map with employee ID

get.description: Return all main jobs associate with list of sub jobs.

parameters.name: productType
parameters.description: specify product type to retrieve, default is shrimp

get.description: Return  list of product sizes, product specs and color of each size
Return  list of weighting target at purchase

post.summary: Post Employee's Job Start and Finish
post.description: This service is tracking for kilo employee that work service job. This accept request for employee start new job and finish job. service require RFID card number and decide if action is start or finish job depend on card type scaned, if scan only employee's card should be finish job or scan both employee and work card should be start job. every time scan it will return infomation of that card or null if can not find in the system

post.summary: Post Employee's Job in Production Line Start and Finish
post.description: This service is tracking for all employees in production line. For start send job ID, work order ID, employee's card number and flag START, finish send only employee's card number and flag FINISH

parameters.name: productType
parameters.description: specify rawmat type to retrieve, default is shrimp

get.description: Get list of weighting job for packing. This will return all jobs in today add config upper & inner weight to measure that weight is complete or incomplete

post.description: Store weight of the packing process.

get.description: Service get bin information, farm code and bin unique ID

Get list of farm codes that are approved by supervisors.
This service will return farm code of the last three days or explicitly put start date and end date, or explicitly put farm code in url query string

post.description: Store weight of the peeling process. The incoming request can be for either before peeling or after peeling, this is differentiated by the weightPos value. If it is before, the system will create a new weight record. Otherwise, it will find the matching record by referenceId and update the record with after peel weight.
Store weight from sizing machines in each basket.

get.description: Call this service for ask bin is closed yet, if not it can be resume.

post.summary: Service post log from rfid system
post.description: Post logs that occur in rfid system like register employee, register job and etc.

get.summary: Service get registered data from rfid system
get.description: Get registered data from RFID system from rfid card number like find who employee ID that bind wiht that rfid card.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: specify type to query exact value

get.description: This service is track bin at each station when bin is checkedin for example bin checkin at station machine sizing or peeling like that

parameters.name: station
parameters.description: Position like sizing machine, kilo peeling

get.description:
Get list of farm codes that are approved by supervisors.

parameters.name: productType
